general.name: Security and Privacy - FileVault
general.description: Enables and manages FileVault encryption on macOS computers. Personal Recovery Key will be escrowed within Jamf Pro and enablement will be required upon next login.
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist
